description: Thungela Resources Limited engages in the mining and production of thermal coal in South Africa. The company owns interests in and produces its thermal coal from seven mining operations in the Mpumalanga province of South Africa, including Goedehoop colliery, Greenside colliery, Isibonelo colliery, Khwezela colliery, Zibulo colliery, Mafube colliery, and Rietvlei colliery. It also exports its products to Indian, Asian, SEA, the Middle East, and North African markets. The company was founded in 1945 and is based in Johannesburg, South Africa.
ceo: Mr. July  Ndlovu BLP, BSc (Hons), CSEP, MBL
